sentences.en: And their transnational mergence of state - owned enterprises will easily lead to monopolize.
sentences.cn: 对我国 国有 企业的购并,很容易形成对某些产业部门的垄断.

sentences.en: Antitrust laws make it illegal to restrain trade or attempt to monopolize a market.
sentences.cn: 反托拉斯法把限制贸易或企图垄断市场定为非法.

sentences.en: Anyway I promise that I never attempt to monopolize your love, for ever.
sentences.cn: 无论如何,我承诺我决不会试图占有它, 永远.

sentences.en: As we know, monopolize is detrimental to fair competition.
sentences.cn: 一旦这种垄断达到能够控制市场的程度,就可能形成对合理的市场竞争的压抑.

sentences.en: Don't monopolize our special guest there are others who would like to talk to her.
sentences.cn: 别把持着我们的贵宾--别人还想跟她谈话呢.

sentences.en: Even in brothels he wanted to monopolize because he had money.
sentences.cn: 逛暗娼他也想独占,因为他有钱.

sentences.en: He monopolized the conversation all evening.
sentences.cn: 整个晚上都是他一个人在说话。

sentences.en: If we join together, we can almost monopolize the whole market.
sentences.cn: 如果我们强强联合, 几乎就能垄断整个市场了.

sentences.en: In order to monopolize power, he does not hesitate to use every mean trick.
sentences.cn: 为了能够擅权, 他不惜使用各种卑劣手段.

sentences.en: Monopolize the conversation with endless personal narrative.
sentences.cn: 不停叙述,垄断谈话过程.

sentences.en: She tended to monopolize the conversation.
sentences.cn: 她说个没完,使别人插不上嘴.

sentences.en: So we should enlarge the reform and opening up in banking, and solve the banking monopolize.
sentences.cn: 应该进一步加大对外开放的广度和深度, 解决国内银行业的垄断问题.

sentences.en: The company has monopolized the soft drinks market.
sentences.cn: 该公司垄断了软饮料市场。

sentences.en: The service providers monopolize the market.
Water back after the city of Changsha people drowned, you can monopolize Changsha.
sentences.cn: 退水后长沙城的人都淹死了, 你还可以独占长沙.

words.tran_cn: 垄断的；独占性的；专利的
[贸易] 买主独家垄断，买主垄断
垄断；独占；拥有…的专卖权

trans.tran_cn: 垄断；独占；拥有…的专卖权
trans.tran_en: to have complete control over something so that other people cannot share it or take part in it

trans.tran_cn: 独占，垄断，拥有…的专卖权
trans.tran_en: to have complete control over something so that other people cannot share it or take part in it
